archimate:ApplicationComponent.name: Cashman
archimate:ApplicationComponent.documentation:
Management of cash orders for ~100 Post Office ATMâ€™s and tracking of notes sent to and from ATMs Used to manage the inventory of cash and cassettes at ATMs Records cash machine data transactions. Transactions are recorded manually by each user in his/her own respective copy.
Total Users: 20, 10 concurrent (Transformed from Access to Dynamics 2015)
